src:
WATCH LIVE: Trump holds rally in Kentucky
04 Nov 2019, 23:15 by Mike Brest



President Trump is holding a "Make America Great Again" rally in Lexington, Kentucky, at 7 p.m. EST to stump for Republican Gov. Matt Bevin ahead of the state's gubernatorial election on Tuesday.
This is one of the first rallies the president has hosted since the House of Representatives voted in favor of an impeachment investigation last week.
